items.text: The takeya originals spout lid works on hydroflask. I prefer that to the hydroflask lid. I like both of them because they are not as heavy.

I actually like Sâ€™well's narrow opening and shape. It makes drinking and gripping it easier. You also learn after a while how much water the bottle can take to avoid overfilling/spilling when closing the lid
I love the Coleman Freeflow for a one hand auto sealing insulated water bottle.
